# Game Engine Skill (English)
Supports Blender/Unity/Unreal MCP integrations described in this project.

## Focus
- Managing engine plugins, MCP helper scripts, and sample `tspec` files.
- Documenting environment setup, asset generation, and cleanup automation.

## Support members
- Blender MCP Specialist (handles `blender_mcp` docs & cleanup)
- Unity MCP Specialist (manages Unity project connections and health checks)
- Unreal MCP Specialist (builds castles/cities, oversees `--auto-mcp` flag behavior)

## How to use
1. When working on Blender/Unity/Unreal manuals or examples, start here.
2. Use the English sheet for behavioral notes and Japanese sheet for localized instructions.
3. Update `docs/Knowledge.md` with new tips (e.g., health diagnostics or cleanup commands).

## Notes
- Additional detail remains in `../game_engine_skill.md`.
